title: Bug 18705: Excessive flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is displaying excessive flashing for unknown reasons.
OB: When interacting with the Control Example, excessive flashing is observed throughout the entire user interface.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the amount of flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Interact with the user interface.
3. Observe the excessive flashing.
